description.narrative:
Project outputs: These activities will result in: Strategic objective 1: NURs staff, teaching and non-teaching, highly skilled in offering entrepreneurial knowledge to the students together with effective overall performance of the NUR staff Successful international workshop with significant presence in media
Strategic objective 2: Students Entrepreneurship Development Unit successfully passed into the second phase of operation with clear role and influence among students Effective awareness raising campaign on the University and the overall community realized General entrepreneurship motivation programme realized on the University Business plan competition realized internal, on university level and national, in cooperation with the partner form the first project year JCI Consulting and advisory services on business starting and growing delivered to local business community
Strategic objective 3: Address to the Ministry of Education and other relevant state institutions with conclusions of the international workshop and recommendations for policy making
Project outcomes: These outputs will lead to: Strategic objective 1: NURs staff highly skilled in providing entrepreneurial knowledge to the students and with strong influence to private sector development and job creation in the community NUR runs active international cooperation regarding curricula development and introduction of efficient entrepreneurship in high education
Strategic objective 2: Students Entrepreneurship Development Unit plays key role in all activities related to promotion of entrepreneurship at the University and in providing technical assistance to the students Highly affirmative and optimistic atmosphere at the University regarding entrepreneurship with high attendance in awareness raising campaign and business plan competition FEM/NUR Consulting and advisory team recognized in the community as reliable supporters to small business growth
Strategic objective 3: National University of Rwanda has influential position in the sector of high education and is recognized as prominent player in advocacy and lobbying on high education

The aim of our project is to: Make National University of Rwanda leading educational institution in the country with the curricula with high entrepreneurial mindset and qualified teaching staff to implement it Accomplish high contribution to the National programme of poverty reduction through active methodology in improving students understanding of entrepreneurship and direct assistance in starting up businesses and self employment Make national University or Rwanda active partner to the national authorities for high education with strong influence on creating more enabling educational system for private sector development
University students, graduates, businessmen, veterans, semi skilled youth and women both urban and rural dwellers

organisation.narrative: Faculty of Economics and Management, National University of Rwanda

mailing-address.narrative: Faculty of Economics and Management, National University of Rwanda Main Campus BP.117, Ruhande, Butare/Liason Office Main Campus BP.117, Ruhande, Butare/Liason KIGALI Rwanda
